item.title: Resources for Getting Started on Data Science
item.description: The image was taken from Cloud Based Data Science. This is a list I compiled of my favorite Data Science resources that are useful to get started on the field. R R for Data Science - https://r4ds.had.co.nz/ “This book will teach you how to do data science with R: You’ll learn how to get your data into R, get it into the most useful structure, transform it, visualise it and model it.
